channel.title: Comments on: Vivian Girls cover Lou Reed on Sound Opinions

item.title: By: Logan K. Young
item.dc:creator: Logan K. Young
item.description: More Girls and less, much less Males. That bespectacled fuck can't even match pitch in the second verse. Decent job translating the piano solo to guitar, but she looked so adolescently hamfisted playing it. And where's the last (repeated) line: "You're gonna reap just what you sow"???
item.content:encoded: More Girls and less, much less Males. That bespectacled fuck can’t even match pitch in the second verse. Decent job translating the piano solo to guitar, but she looked so adolescently hamfisted playing it. And where’s the last (repeated) line: “You’re gonna reap just what you sow”???
